title: Crunchy banana yoghurt
description: Banana and yoghurt are a perfect low-calorie breakfast combination that will keep you going until lunchtime. The banana adds sweetness without the need for extra sugar and the seeds bring a satisfying crunch.As part of an Intermittent diet plan, 1 serving provides:Your daily piece of fruit2 of your 3 daily low-fat dairy portionsThis meal provides 149 kcal per portion.
